songs.title: 2017 Grammy’s Best Rap Performance Speech
songs.lyrics: Yo, Andrew Barber! I just wanna say thank you to my team, for being here.... shit this is crazy... sorry uh, thank God for this, damn I'm shaking, this is crazy. Thank you everybody for supporting me. Thank you [?]. Oh... wooo! I love my family, I love God and I love music. Thank you, guys!
